alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 03 at 2:29PM CST until February 03 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 315 PM CST. * At 229 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Deer Park, or 6 miles west of Citronelle, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Deer Park and Tibbie. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama.
